name: Rock the Paper ,Scissor!
description:
This is a scissor ,paper and rock game . I made this game in 2 days due to the boredom.

Have fun playing this game ! If you find any bug please consider fixing it .Source code of this project can be found in the game folder :)

Credit to me

Game Design : Rupesh Ram(Me)

Game Music : Rupesh Ram(Me)
